mapper.insert: insert into shopping_car( user_id, goods_id, number ) values ( #{userId}, #{goodsId}, #{number} )
mapper.select: select sc.id from shopping_car sc where sc.user_id = #{uid} and sc.goods_id = #{cid} and sc.settled = 0
